issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

projectCategory.description: Titanium and related SDKs used in application development
projectCategory.name: Client

resolution.description: A fix for this issue is checked into the tree and tested.
resolution.name: Fixed

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.description:
Modules built pre 1.8.0.1 need to be rebuilt for use with 1.8.0.1 and later due to changes needed to support multiple runtimes.  Adding a new property in the manifest.xml for modules of "apiversion" that can be checked when a project is being built.  

If the apiversion is less than 2 or does not exist we will log an error message and exit the build process.
fields.summary: Android:  Modules:  add support for handling a new apiversion property in a module manifest.xml

comments.body:
Tested with 1.8.0.1.v20111209011840 with v8/rhino on Mac 10.6.8 with an old module:
[ERROR] The 'apiversion' for 'ti.paypal' in the module manifest is not a valid value.  Please use a version of the module that has an 'apiversion' value of 2 or greater set in it's manifest file
